name: Bellner
description: Tema para el sitio web de Telesur
author: Servicios web

scripts.compress: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../_telesur.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map webpack.config.js postcss.config.js tailwind.config.js src
scripts.deploy: npm run webpack:development & npm run postcss:development
scripts.deploy:watch: npm run deploy & npm run watch
scripts.build:deploy: npm run webpack:production & npm run postcss:production
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
